description:
Re: 6 month safety works
T10 (tag: 0329) Large leaved lime adjacent to central path through Charterhouse Square. Lift low hanging crown back to the vicinity of previous pruning
points at approx 3m to an even level all round
- Remove basal growth
T11 (tag:0328) Large leaved lime on edge of driveway adjacent to John Vane Science Centre staff entrance
- Lift low crown to approx. 3m all round to an even level
- Remove basal growth
T12 (tag: 0327) Large leaved lime adjacent to central path through Charterhouse Square.
- Lift low hanging crown back to the vicinity of previous pruning points at approx 3m to an even level all round
- Remove basal growth
T13 (tag: 0330) Large leaved lime adjacent to central path through Charterhouse Square- Lift low hanging crown back to the vicinity of previous pruning points at approx 3m to an even level all round- Remove basal growth
T14 (0331) Large leaved lime adjacent to central path through Charterhouse Square.
-- Lift low hanging crown back to the vicinity of previous pruning points at approx 3m to an even level all round
- Remove basal growth
T15 (tag 0332) Large leaved lime adjacent to central path through Charterhouse Square forming attractive avenue.
- Lift low hanging crown back to the vicinity of previous pruning points at approx 3m to an even level all round
- Remove basal growth
T16 (tag: 0333) Large leaved lime adjacent to central path through Charterhouse Square
-- Lift low hanging crown back to the vicinity of previous pruning points at approx 3m to an even level all round
- Remove basal growth
T17 (tag: 0138) Semi mature Whitebeam adjacent to central path through Charterhouse Square.
- Remove basal growth
- Lift low hanging crown back to approx 3m to an even level all round
